info.title: PostgreSQLManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure management API provides create, read, update, and delete functionality for Azure PostgreSQL resources including servers, databases, firewall rules, VNET rules, security alert policies, log files and configurations with new business model.

get.description: Gets the private link resources for PostgreSQL server.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 OperationIdNotFound - The operation with Id does not exist.

 * 404 OperationIdNotFound - The operation with Id does not exist.

 * 409 OperationCancelled - The operation has been cancelled by user.

 * 409 OperationInterrupted - The operation on the resource could not be completed because it was interrupted by another operation on the same resource.

 * 500 OperationTimedOut - The operation timed out and automatically rolled back. Please retry the operation.

get.description: Gets a private link resource for PostgreSQL server.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: The name of the private link resource.
